info.name: gpum - Google mail Popup Unread Manager
info.description:
Readable, user friendly gpum tweaks.

You can find it here, the best gmail extension for FireFox: https://addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/gpum/
addons.mozilla.org/firefox/addon/gpum
info.additionalInfo:
1) 0 mail or inactive mailbox icon is without content label. (no more "0" and "-")
2) Better and bigger fonts for easier reading.
3) Few tweaks to look bigger, but still stay smaller. (New mail counter)
4) New thicker icons.
